Package edu.ou.cs2334.project4.views

Class NonogramMakerView

java.lang.Object
edu.ou.cs2334.project4.views.NonogramMakerView
public class NonogramMakerView extends Object
The NonogramMakerView formats the gird created by the CellGridView and the Menu items.
Version:
0.1
Author:
Henry Malilay

  • Constructor Details

    • NonogramMakerView

      public NonogramMakerView​(int numRows, int numCols, int cellLength)
      Instantiates a new nonogram maker view. Also Initializes the border pane and formats the items (grid and menu). Also creates a new cellGridView for adding buttons.
      Parameters:
      numRows - the number of rows
      numCols - the number of columns
      cellLength - the cell length
